dt: {bc}a physician specializing in medical conditions of the ear, nose, throat, and neck {bc}{sx|otolaryngologist||}

dt.t: Otolaryngologists, commonly known as ear, nose and throat doctors or {wi}ENTs{/wi}, treat diseases and disorders of the ear, nose and throat, including problems with the sinuses and inner ear.
A second {wi}ENT{/wi} thought the problem might be a blocked eustachian tube, which the doctor cleaned out.

shortdef: a physician specializing in medical conditions of the ear, nose, throat, and neck : otolaryngologist
